I really enjoy this game. The mechanics are fun, and I always come back to it. However, there can be lots of toxic players, and it isn't unusual to have multiple bad games in a row. Also, the devs are inconsistent, and honestly are probably the worst part of the game. They frequently release buggy updates, or delay events with little notice at all. I love this game, so I'm going to keep playing it, but it isn't for everyone unless you have patience.

Great game for any survival horror fan. 

It's really 2 games in one and you will always like one side more than the other but there's nothing wrong with that. 
Killers seem more OP then they are, more so at low levels. The ranked climb can be a bit of a slog, but highly possible for either side. People complain about the same meta builds but everything has a counter and requires the game to be played to unlock the required perks.

But like many games, the community is trash. Most survivors I encounter are good sports but there are the odd "rotten apple" that will just dc at the slightist chance that they might die or get mad when they get killed. Point farmers are all too common and can all go eat a bag of dicks imo. They act so entitled and childish when they game ends too soon or the killer just smacks them in the face instead of playing along. 

Either have a thick skin or just play with friends. If you have 4 other friends, it can be a very fun game (3 if you just want to queue as a survivor team). Just be prepared for concentrated salt from randos.

Me gusto el juego.

This game is actually so good. Great gameplay that really makes you nervous. 10/10 would buy.

So I have been playing this game for 346h and it's a fun game and everything but the development for it..... shesh... So basically as I saw A LOT of people complain about the same things that also bother me so I won't mention them... But I should probably mention that everytime the game gets an update and I update it and then when I lauch it it crashes.... I didn't know what the problem was at first but then I verifyed the game files and it turned out that 5-10 files always went missing and i had to redownload them again (to be correct those files are from 5-20gb big....). It's just sad how the put effort into new game content... I would be out of the universe happy if they would actually make an big "update" based only on removing the bugs that have been here since the game came out.... 

I have also been playing for years and this game has one of the most toxic communities (shout out to the guy that wrote the review about the community and what a bad addiction it is.). It's just sad how u get addicted to "being better" then other players and then sh*t talking them with a non-censored chat, there is just so much negativity that i can't even explain...

You are probably checking the reviews to see if it's worth the money.... I would say a YES and a NO at the same time... It's a fun game and all but there is only one game mode you can play on after all the year and the stuff the either buff or nerf for no reason makes no sense... It's super fun playing with friends but at the end sometimes happens that content creators shade the game because playing with friends is an option (why? because the killers get either t-bagged or looped to much). I would also love to point out some of the killers hit-boxes... thats just insane that they can hit me all the way from the USA to the killer shack.. It's a big advantage for killers then the survivors have no option to escape or either no will to play anymore (pointing out Coup de gr√¢ce - no offense to the users of this perk but when it's used on a killer with a f*cked launge there is no more will I have to even exist on this planet).

Also skins are nice and stuff but they only focus them on the new characters + the fact that the new characters get worked on so much that the old ones are neglected *khm* NEA *khm* and all the other guy characters (since i have a feeling they are slower then females).

There is alot more of things I would love to write about how trash this game is but there is no point since it's not gonna help or they won't even consider working/updating the game... JUST SAD

Thanks for listening to my pep talk :D

A very fun, quick, but high learning curve casual game.  Since it's multiplayer, it bound to have toxic people. Try your best to ignore them. Overall, I'm investing my time now in this game as it fits my free-time hours. 10-15 mins intense match is a goody goody game for me.

Execelente jogo com uma jogabilidade boa, competitivo, √© o hoje que da pra passar horas jogando com os amigos.

Game play is definitely fun, but the matchmaking is a nightmare, new players will constantly get matched up with hardened veterans, so if you are new to the game expect to get completely owned in your first few matches

the community is also pretty nasty for the most part, EVERY SINGLE MATCH that i lost as the killer the survivors waited at the exit to taunt me by running in and out of the map

this is definitely a fun game to watch others play on youtube, but i do NOT recommend picking this up unless you are ONLY playing with friends in a private game and are all learning it together

La verdad,muy buen juego,te lleva a un mundo genial de terror y suspenso,muy recomendado,muy entretenido y agradable de jugar,en especial con amigos
Lo unico malo por el momento que noto es la busqueda de partidas como asesino,que suele tardar,pero mas que eso lo recomiendo mucho este juego, los personajes,las historias,habilidades, etc son muy bueno y me encanta el juego
Lots of replayability and progression; fun and unique gameplay
Jogo muito bom para se divertir com os amigos.

This is a really fun game with a lot of replay value. You don't need complex or varied mechanics to make this fun. Hide and go seek with a killer. + objectives

If you enjoy waiting at least 10 minutes for a match when there are +25,000 players online, then this is the game for you!
